channel.title: Yell command help needed!
channel.description:
i need help with getting a donor yell command, i tried it alot of ways, but it still doesnt work please help me! here are some pictures so you can see, and maybe help me with what im doing wrong:

item.title: Yell command help needed!
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

[quote=“ii bandos ii, post:4, topic:380562”]try useing this command

[code]

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && c.isDonator == 1 && c.playerRights == 0) {
			String rank = "";
			String Message = playerCommand.substring(4).toLowerCase();
			if (c.isDonator == 1) {
				rank = "[Donator] ["+ c.playerName +"]:";
			}       
			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; 
					c2.sendMessage(rank+Message);
				}
			}
		}

[/code][/quote]

Won’t work for his server, look at the command he has already given.

Maybe make the regular players one into:

if (playerRights == 0 && donator == 0)

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command help needed!
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii ii bandos ii
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii wrote:

try useing this command

[code]

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && c.isDonator == 1 && c.playerRights == 0) {
			String rank = "";
			String Message = playerCommand.substring(4).toLowerCase();
			if (c.isDonator == 1) {
				rank = "[Donator] ["+ c.playerName +"]:";
			}       
			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; 
					c2.sendMessage(rank+Message);
				}
			}
		}
